scripts.generate: tsc && chmod +x dist/main.js && npx firebase emulators:exec --export-on-exit=../.firestore-data dist/main.js
scripts.generate-tiny: tsc && chmod +x dist/tiny.js && npx firebase emulators:exec --export-on-exit=../.firestore-data dist/tiny.js
scripts.generate-level2: tsc && chmod +x dist/level2_two_rows.js && npx firebase emulators:exec --export-on-exit=../.firestore-data dist/level2_two_rows.js
scripts.generate-level1: tsc && chmod +x dist/level1_two_primitives.js && npx firebase emulators:exec --export-on-exit=../.firestore-data dist/level1_two_primitives.js
scripts.generate-level3: tsc && chmod +x dist/level3_two_primitives_two_rows.js && npx firebase emulators:exec --export-on-exit=../.firestore-data dist/level3_two_primitives_two_rows.js
